name: Serie Tribute: 13 - Shazam
description:
This new series has a collectible card format. It will make a tribute tour about superheroes and villains. A new creative venture of Roboto Inc. for its great collectors. Prototypes designed by Norma Xelda Jara. Let's have fun! 

First Appearance: Whiz Comics #2 (February 1940); Fawcett Comics (1939-1953); DC Comics (1972-present)
 He is the alter ego of Billy Batson, a boy who, by uttering the magic word "SHAZAM" (Acronym for six "immortal elders": Solomon, Hercules, Atlas, Zeus, Achilles and Mercury), can transform into a costumed adult with the powers of superhuman strength, speed, flight and other abilities. The character fights against an extensive gallery of villains, mainly the archenemies Doctor Sivana, Seven Deadly Sins, Black Adam and Mister Mind.
